survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on which new features should be prioritized in our online banking platform development roadmap.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use our online banking platform?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button scale for clear single selection. Consider randomizing the order of options to prevent bias.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use our online banking platform?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of these potential new features would be most valuable to you? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Randomize option order to prevent positional bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes (multi-choice with max 3 selections)

script.question_text: Which of these potential new features would be most valuable to you? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What security concerns, if any, prevent you from using online banking more frequently?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only for respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended response will provide qualitative insights. Ensure mobile-friendly text entry field.

script.question_text: What security concerns, if any, prevent you from using online banking more frequently?
script.routing_logic: Appears only for respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with our current mobile banking app's user interface?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with radio buttons. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with our current mobile banking app's user interface?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What other banking features would you like to see that we haven't mentioned?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture innovative ideas. Provide sufficient space for detailed responses.
